website_summaries.verdict: This barrel stands out due to the fact that it can "hold its liquor" and not leak.
pros: Comes with a stand, bung, spigot, paper funnels, and instructions
Well made, with no reports of leaks
cons: Some buyers found this barrel to be smaller than they expected

customer_reviews.title: There are a lot better quality barrels out there.
customer_reviews.text: After having this Barrel for 3-4 months, the quality is not as good as the other barrels I bought around the same time. It constantly leaks and the seals around the leaver are very poor quality. It does not pour right and now it is ripped and useless when I tried to fix it. The flavor is the only thing that is good, but isn’t that the whole point of this barrel if you can not pour it out!
customer_reviews.author: mike sed

customer_reviews.title: Barrel Leaks
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 barrels. One of them leaks on the barrel and the valve. It well wellsoaked prior to use. These maybe cute decorations but do not use.
customer_reviews.author: mmbeanys

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for heartbreak this is the barrel for you.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect if you are looking for some heartbreak. I followed the instructions to the letter. Spent two decades perfecting my recipe. Poured my heart and soul into crafting an amazing high rye bourbon, then barreled it. After a year, lo and behold the barrel was empty. A slow leak between the slats and it was all gone. Having slowly evaporated. The angels took more than their share. I truly hope they enjoyed it. So angry right now. If it were possible to leave a negative 5 star rating I would.
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.... ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.text: Item is very well made, sealed up in about three hours. I have reposato tequila aging in the barrel and look forward to a sample in several weeks. The vanilla bean recipe is what I started with. I also have a 5L barrel that I received as a gift but don't know enough yet to use that big barrel..... Update.... two weeks later sampled the spirit and it is very, very good. The oak color is there and a smooth vanilla flavor is present. I liked it so much I ordered another barrel to age rum in and I also included vanilla beans in that one too. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: RMO

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It was a big hit with my Army buddy. He’s drunk half the time anyway. He’s filled and emptied it about 35 times in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Clint Coyle

customer_reviews.title: A leak that Cannot be stopped
customer_reviews.text: We are instructed to "cure" the cask with a water and alcohol mixture that will slightly swell the wood so as to make it "water-tight." I "cured" the cask for over a month...changing the fluid every two weeks, but the contact point with teh spigot continued to leak. tapping it does not fix either. Unusable...
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This keg is amazing. I am still experimenting with leaving different spirits ...
customer_reviews.text: This keg is amazing. I am still experimenting with leaving different spirits in it, but so far I have yet to be disappointed. Plus the ascetics of this piece is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The instructions said not to return. The whiskey barrel we received was poorly made. Not only is it still leaking, but black gets all over the sink- hard to remove and it’s bled on the barrel. Also disappointing, the holes for the spigot and top hole we’re not drilled out well and the pieces of wood hang inside the barrel from those holes.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Carella

customer_reviews.title: Great barrel for aging your favorite whiskey and other alcohol spirits.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these barrels in the last few years from different sellers. This one seems to be slightly better buiIt. I was impressed with my first barrel so I ordered another one to give away as a gift. Ill update again after I fine a nice whiskey to age. I rate this whiskey barrel and company 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.author: Triple Bogie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect barrel, but plan ahead.
customer_reviews.text: I love my 2 liter barrel. I cured it over night to watch for leaks. I kept checking it for about an hour, waxed up a few leaks and haven’t had one since. Because of the reviews I planned ahead and got some wax. The barrel is perfect for my party and will age more after to have on hand. After two weeks I had a sample.....yum! Great barrel!!
customer_reviews.author: S. England

customer_reviews.title: Don't  buy  this trash!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy its junk . I Followed the instructions Let it soak with water For a couple of days tell it stop leaking It was 5 days. Then I put two Spirits to make a poor man's pappy and I Left it there For a couple of days. I went out of town for work came back to find all of it on the floor what makes me mad the it hard to find those bottles.. trash
customer_reviews.author: alejandro

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!!
customer_reviews.text: Only gave two stars because that's how long I have had this..... just 2 months! As previous owners have stated...IT LEAKS! I got this as a Christmas gift 2018 and today March 2nd, I went to pour in some bourbon only to see it leaking from both ends!! I cannot understand, I have used this 2x's since I got it and now it leaks! Wish I could return or get a replacement!! Hint Hint!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great barrels
customer_reviews.text: These barrels are fantastic!! They are the same design as the large factory barrels, and as far as I can tell the same construction. Yes they leak a little when you first get them. Follow the directions n they’re great! I used warm water to rinse them then hot water to fill, till leaks stop. Only takes a couple days. Can’t wait to try my product!! Great job folks, much appreciated!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have never done a review on any product until now. I have been less than satisfied with other products but never enough to take time for a review. My barrel only stopped leaking water after applying the wax. I than filled it with whiskey and it leaked out. It made a mess on top of wasting my whiskey. Do Not Buy! Again Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the connoisseur
customer_reviews.text: Though the burned design in the front had a few small blemishes, everything else was as expected. holds liquid without leaking and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Water tight, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Barrel shipped quickly. It did not leak even when first letting the barrel soak with water. Still water tight seal with a few bottles of Malört inside. I will update on flavor in another month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of it but I've been trying to get it you seal for three weeks now. I thought it was, so I put in some whiskey and let it age for two weeks and had half the bottle drip slowly on the counter. I think I could have got a bad barrel. If it worked it would be 5 stars what whiskey I had left was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: jayson

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to ageing my own!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift so it's not been opened or used yet, but I'm sure it will be great. I gave 4 stars only because I haven't opened it and inspected it fully. The seller was great, the cost is great, the concept is great. If you like liquors and want to age some of your own, don't hesitate to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Still dripping water after 2 weeks. Bad quality. Very bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made cask.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid, with no leaks. Support from seller is exceptional. I’m looking forward to aging Irish Whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Slammer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item. Has been leaking for 2 weeks. Stained my bathtub. Metal straps have now rusted. The exterior is stained and looks terrible. Huge waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never would seal, leaked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and we stored whiskey in the barrel for a few months in our attic. The barrel never sealed (are we properly followed the directions) and leaked everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Macie

customer_reviews.title: Great costomer service.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great Berrel. It had a slow leak that was taking longer than normal to close so I e mailed the company and got a very quick response. They handled all my questions and I am one happy shiner.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Albury

customer_reviews.title: Never worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for my husband. He followed all the instructions it came with exactly and it still just leaked all the whiskey out. Kind of a bummer. Now its just a decoration.
customer_reviews.author: SCalli

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Follow the instructions. Matches the decor of my living room, sitting there with likker in it. Thinking bout buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: HuntBuck

customer_reviews.title: Chay
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this purchase. Metal rusted immediately and continuous leak from the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Not Water Tight
customer_reviews.text: Barrel will not hold liquid, after a month of soaking and the wood has faded bad, not finished very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last - leaked after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product the first time we used it. However when we filled it the second time it was leaking. Waste of money and whiskey
customer_reviews.author: CBaskin

customer_reviews.title: Stand cracked
customer_reviews.text: It's going back, stand it's cracked and made so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Zdenek lesa

customer_reviews.title: 1L oak Barrel
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was very fast. The char could be a little more.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for a friend and sampled rye whiskey that was aged last night......fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Kotula

customer_reviews.title: Better quality on amazon for the same price
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. Third party seller refused to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Constantly leaks
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it, did all directions correctly and still leaks
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Red Head barrels are the best. I have 4 now
customer_reviews.author: Peter W Watts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for two friends as a wedding gift. They absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller then you think..
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller then I thought.. seen similar ones in stores way bigger at same price. I also question if this will even hold 2 liters.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Wild Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift. Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as Christmas gift. The idea is fun and he liked it. I followed direction to cure the barrel but it still leaked. The customer service is awesome and they sent me barrel wax right away and it fixed the leak. I’m not a whiskey drinker so I can’t tell you if it really enhanced the flavor. My husband though the flavor was just ok for our first try. I think this is a great gift idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Yu-Tin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty disappointed. I’ve had really good success in buying barrels on amazon in the past and thus is the first that’s disappointed. Major issues with leakage. I let it cure with with water for three days with no leaking. Then when filled with bourbon it leaked. I tried to seal with wax and no luck. My second attempt at bourbon in this led to about a half litre of loss to leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Milne

customer_reviews.title: Turned a $20 bottle into a $40 bottle in 2 weeks! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves this! I got it for him as a gift. Customer service is amazing, unfortunately the spigot it came with was faulty but they were quick and helpful. 2 week aged Ancient Age tastes like Eagle Rare... Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: John Corfman

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere, terrible customer servixe
customer_reviews.text: Worst gift I have ever bought. Leaks in several spots. Have been trying to return for over two weeks and can’t get the label for the free return and no custom service to help. DON’T BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: happypete

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't stopped leaking...... still.  What is the secret?
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my tequila. So I thought I would age some on my own and did some research for an oak barrel. No cheesy foreign plastic bag lined barrel. I wanted to do it right. This is not the option that I wanted. Follow instructions to the letter. Wasted about to liters of Blanco before I gave up. Don't waste your time. I had to give it a one-star just to proceed with the review.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell R.

customer_reviews.title: He's happy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my fiance as a gift over the holidays. He was excited to experiment with aging cocktails. While we haven't sampled the first one yet, this little barrel is holding his first concoction without a single drip. He had fun researching what to try and is anxious to sample in a couple weeks. In the meantime we're thinking about ordering a second one already.
customer_reviews.author: cmpnski

customer_reviews.title: Used for gifts!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I expected but still good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for someone just getting into aging things as a hobby
customer_reviews.author: ryan fox

customer_reviews.title: Love this barrel
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful barrel looks great! Great price. Creates a nice mellow flavor. Liked it so much bought a 5 liter one as well.
customer_reviews.author: kmburnette

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to seal this barrel for several weeks now. I have filled it up 3 times already and it keeps leaking from the spout. Tried soaking it from the outside and now all the paint on the rings washed off.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Pilcher

product_meta.title: Engraved 2 Liter Charred American White Oak Aging Barrel (Whiskey Distillery)
product_meta.description: Color:Whiskey DistilleryDo you like getting more drink for your buck? The only difference between bottom shelf and top shelf liquor is that it was aged longer. How would you like the 20 year scotch taste for the 8 year old price? Or, turn your cheap bottle of whiskey, tequila, rum, bourbon, scotch, brandy or cognac in to a delicious bottle of single barrel, hand crafted reserve? What took them years to do in a large 55 gallon oak barrel you can do at home in just a few weeks. You can! You can also take a $40 bottle of wine and turn it in to a $400 bottle of wine. You can do it all in a Red Head Oak Barrel in just 4 – 6 weeks. These mini American Oak barrels are hand-made by a multi-generational Cooper. They make great gifts since they can be custom engraved for personal pride or great for corporate branding. You can now age and flavor your liquor and wine to the taste you prefer. Our oak barrels are available by size. The size of the barrel is determined by the number of Liters it will hold such as a One Liter Barrel holds 1 Liter or your standard liquor bottle whereas a Twenty Liter Barrel holds roughly 5 Gallons. We also offer Cigar Infusing Barrels. These American white oak barrels are charred on the inside, which is a process that caramelizes the sugar in the wood. Your favorite alcohol is poured into the barrel, sealed with a bung and aged to add depth and character. The spirit (or wine) literally pulls flavor out of the wood, infusing the liquid with earthy and vanilla tones. Hotter temperatures expand the spirit, pushing it into the wood and cooler temperatures draw the liquid and flavor out. This process is repeated everyday, for months. The barrels are pressure sealed with steel hoops, can be engraved with the design of your choice, and comes with a spigot, bung and stand. Red Head Oak Barrels’ American Oak Aging Barrels are available with or without engravings. Perfect for aging any store bought spirit (or even moonshine) or custom cocktail
feature_bullets: Best quality and flavor - charred American white oak aging barrels. 2L holds slightly more than 1.75mL
Flavor your favorite whiskey, rum, tequila, bourbon, scotch or wine with great oak barrels

Each barrel comes with the stand, bung, spigot, instructions and paper funnel. The 2 liter oak barrel is approximately 7″ from end to end and about 6″ in diameter and holds approximately 1/2 gallon (1.75L) Text reads Est. 2019
Top manufacturer of oak barrels in U.S.. No custom engraving available on this item. It is pre-engraved, stocked and shipped by Amazon directly.
All Red Head Barrels are pressure tested for leaks to highest quality standards available
